data.name: Global Azure Atlanta 2020
data.description: The annual Global Azure (formerly Global Azure Bootcamp) event will return to the greater metro-Atlanta area for the 6th year! The Global Azure event is a free one-day mini-conference, taking place on April 23-25 2020 in venues across the world, driven by Microsoft Azure experts and community enthus…

relatedRecords.name: CFS  - Spring 2020 Reston Azure DataFest: Big Data & Analytics Conference
relatedRecords.description:
Hello Everyone!
We are pleased to announce that registration is open for “Spring 2020 Reston Azure DataFest”, a 1-day event on Friday, April 17, 2020, 9:00AM to 5:00PM at the Microsoft offices at 12012 Sunset Hills Road, Reston,VA., 20190. We will be in Rooms 3028, 3054, 3058, and 3062.
Event Sched…

relatedRecords.name: Apache DC Roadshow 2020
relatedRecords.description: ApacheCon and Apache Roadshow Events are the place to come learn what Apache projects are doing, as well as a place for projects to come build stronger project communities, and forge bonds between projects.

relatedRecords.name: Stir Trek
relatedRecords.description: Stir Trek is a one-day conference in Columbus, Ohio focused on teaching software developers the latest and greatest in technologies, techniques, and tools. The full day of content is always concluded with a private screening of a blockbuster film on its opening day.

relatedRecords.description: Boise Code Camp is Boise’s premier free-to-the-community software development technical event and the longest running Code Camp in the Northwest.
